name: Local, GPU-Accelerated LLM with AnythingLLM and Ollama on Debian
description: I setup a fully private, offline, and GPU-accelerated Large Language Model (LLM) on a Debian 12 system using an AMD Radeon RX 7700 XT.
summary: How to Run a Local, GPU-Accelerated LLM with AnythingLLM and Ollama on Debian (AMD ROCm Guide)

name: Pi-Hole Raspberry Pi Project
description: Configured a single-board computer (Raspberry Pi) to run a DNS sinkhole using Docker as application container. This enabled network-level advertisement blocking.
summary: Linux network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application.

name: Pwnagotchi: A2C-Algorithm Wi-Fi Security Auditing Project
description: Built and configured a 'Pwnagotchi'. This device, built on a Raspberry Pi Zero W, is a physical tool for learning about Wi-Fi network security in a practical, ethical manner. The Pwnagotchi uses an Advantage Actor-Critic (A2C) learning model to passively sniff and actively capture WPA/WPA2 handshake data. Its goal is to learn from its surrounding Wi-Fi environment to become more efficient at identifying and capturing data useful for security auditing.
summary: A2C-Based Wifi Security Auditing Tool built on a Raspberry Pi Zero W
